data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Bot::CPAN is a POE based distribution that allows individuals on
    IRC to query the CPAN in a great number of different ways. Bot::CPAN
    will also automatically inform the channels of new uploads to the
    CPAN. It seems to have been received positively on the IRC channels
    it has been bound to.
